#labels RemoteAdmin,Featured,Executable
= RemoteAdmin executable for Windows =

This executable have been compiled with [BamCompile http://www.bambalam.se/bamcompile/] from a PHP script based on the RemoteAdmin  PHP Class.

Download it Downloads section.

= Usage =

It is used in command line :

*RemoteAdmin.exe hostIP password command parameters*

Examples :

RemoteAdmin.exe 127.0.0.1 secret admin_shutdown

RemoteAdmin.exe 77.10.2.1 password admin_broadcast message "My message to send sim wide :D"
